name: io.continis.hats
description:
A framework to enable Editor workspaces, to customise the user experience of the Editor.
Workspaces can have rules that trigger on activation, such as loading an Editor layout, a Scene Overlays layout, locking folders in Project view, or objects in the scene.

In addition to this, developers can built their own user-reactive tools, which change appearance and behaviour based on which workspace is active.

samples.description: Contains a simple rule to showcase how to create a custom Workspace rule.
Contains a sample of an Inspector that changes based on the active Team.
